page.title: 15ATTITUDES OF ARBROATH KIDS 2
page.content: Although most children appeared to enjoy a wide variety of{recreational} activites they were not short of ideas when suggesting what facilities the area lacked.Not suprisingly in view of the fact that a lot of them listed ice skating as a hobby many of them wished to see an ice rink in the area.Also the children said that although there was enough parkland in the area not enough use was made of this{landscape} .They wanted to see an adventure playground with tarzan swings,a roundabout,chutes,etc.For{leisure}the children requested that a B.M.X.track be built.Children said that they liked living in the area because of the woods nearby,the closeness of the beach,and the fact that they had good friends who stayed close by.
